Title: Slow West
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Romance, Thriller, Western
Actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Caren Pistorius, Aorere Paki, Jeffrey Thomas
Plot: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.
Production: DMC Film, Rachel Gardner Films, See-Saw Films
